sect1.title: Usage
sect1.para: vtkIconGlyphFilter takes in a vtkPointSet where each point corresponds to the center of an icon. Scalar integer data must also be set to give each point an icon index. This index is a zero based row major index into an image that contains a grid of icons. You must also set pixel Size of the icon image and the size of a particular icon.
To create an instance of class vtkIconGlyphFilter, simply invoke its constructor as follows obj = vtkIconGlyphFilter
